name: Dancing Color
description:
Dancing Color: Smash Circles is most engaging game where your ball smashes like a tank through colorful circles that block its descent, but if you hit a different one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again.. Show your hopping skills, concentration power and one finger touch control. Move and drag your finger to smash the circles！Keep your pace with fancy rhythm!

Features:
- You can play with all your fantastic EDM songs
- Endless Mode
- 100+ levels
- Offline Game
- Endless gameplay
- Free casual arcade game for all ages!
- One finger control.
- Swipe left, right to move your ball.

Try it now! Music lovers will definitely love it!
